---
name: create-instructions
description: Instructions Generator
---
Take the information below and generate an agent instructions .md file for it in the /docs directory. If a .md filename is provided, use that, otherwise create a appropriate filename based on the content. Make sure the instructions are concise and not too long. Make sure to update the AGENTS.md file to reference this new instructions file. If no information is provided below, prompt the user to give the necessary details about the layer of architcture or coding standards to document.
